summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        Your task: Provide a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image, focusing on its relevance to gameplay. 
        Describe key visual elements such as characters, enemies, UI components (e.g., health bars, icons), environments, or any text hints present. 
        Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image shows a third-person view of a character crouching and sneaking through a rocky and grassy environment. The character appears to be holding a weapon, possibly a bow. In the distance, a red dashed circle highlights an enemy or target. The UI displays various icons on the bottom left and right corners, indicating available abilities or items. The top right corner shows numerical values for points (+40) and a resource called "Will" (+4, x49). The bottom left corner includes a health bar and other status indicators. The environment suggests a stealth or exploration scenario within a rugged terrain.
